main-text:
"Please, you must help me, I'm
in grave danger!" She removes
three objects from the folds of
her torn cloak and hands them
to you. "I am a Transom agent,
a special investigator for
Sharushid Megacorporation, and
I have discovered a traitor
named Konrad Kiefer. He plans
to aid the Zhodani in a
treacherous surprise attack
against the Imperium. If he
succeeds, it will surely lead
to another destructive Frontier
War."
